text:
Hello, i have managed to run canICA on my FMRI datasets, yielding physiologically plausible components in voxel space. 

i would like to use canICA to filter out noise by removing all components which are not related to my signal of interest (it was a visual task). 

so i want to return to my 3d+time FMRI dataset, but only use components which i will decide based on their spatial weight maps if they are contributing relevant signal. 

does anyone know how to do this? either canICA or DictLearning would be great. thanks!
Russell
title: using canICA to denoise?
